translation.en: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
translation.sw: Wobenya hangi a ɔhyew a efi asase no mu anoa wɔ mmeae ahorow pii wɔ Rotorua, na wobetumi anya hangi a aka no nso wɔ Christchurch, Wellington ne mmeae afoforo.

translation.en: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).
translation.sw: MetroRail wɔ kuw mmienu wɔ keteke a wɔde fa nkurofo wɔ Cape Town mu ne ɛho no: MetroPlus (a wɔsan frɛ no Adefo Afa) ne Metro (a wɔsan frɛ no nea ne bo wɔ fam).

translation.en: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.
translation.sw: MetroPlus no mu wɔ ahotɔ paa na nnipa no nnɔɔso nanso ne bo yɛ den kakra, ɛwom sɛ ne bo yɛ fo sen tekiti a wotwa ma metro no wɔ Europa no.

translation.en: Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
translation.sw: Keteke biara wɔ adefo afa ne nea ne bo wɔ fam afa no nyinaa bi; bere biara no adefo afa no wɔ keteke ne fa a etwa to a ɛbɛn Cape Town.

translation.en: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders.
translation.sw: Nneɛma a wɔsoa ma afoforo - Nyi w’ani mfi wo nneɛma so, titiriw no bere a woretwa amanaman hye mu no.

translation.en: You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble.
translation.sw: Woanhwɛ a wɔde wo bɛyɛ obi a ɔsoa nnubɔne a wonnim, na ebetumi de wo ato esaine kɛse paa mu.

translation.en: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice.
translation.sw: Wobetumi ama moato santene, bere a wɔde nkraman a wohuahua nnubɔne di dwuma a worenhu.

translation.en: Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death.
translation.sw: Aman ahorow bi wɔ asotwe a ano yɛ den paa ma wɔn, bere a edi kan a wɔafom no; ebetumi ayɛ afiase nna a ɛboro mfe 10 anaa owu.

translation.en: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
translation.sw: Wɔbetumi awia baage ahorow a obiara nni ho na ebetumi nso atwetwe abammɔfo a wɔn ani di topae ahunahuna akyi no adwen aba so.

translation.en: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them.
translation.sw: Wɔ baabi a wofi no, esaine sɛ mmoawa a wɔma yare wɔ hɔ no akɔ wo nnipaduam nti, ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ wobenya.

translation.en: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems.
translation.sw: Nanso wɔ wiase afa ahorow bi a mmoawammoawa no yɛ foforo ma wo nnipadua no, ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wobehyia ɔhaw ahorow.

translation.en: Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.
translation.sw: Afei, wɔ mmeae a ɛyɛ hye no, mmoawammoawa no nyin ntɛm na wotumi tena honam no ani kyɛ.

translation.en: Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.
translation.sw: Ɛno na ɛde Delhi Belly, Pharoah’s Curse no, Montezuma’s Revenge, ne wɔn nnamfonom bebree haw no bae.

translation.en: As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
translation.sw: Sɛnea yenya home mu nyarewa wɔ mmeae a ɛhɔ yɛ awɔw no, nsono mu nyarewa nyɛ nna wɔ mmeae a ɔhyew wɔ no na mpɛn pii no ɛyɛ ahi ankasa nanso ɛnyɛ hu saa.

translation.en: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock.
translation.sw: Sɛ ɛyɛ bere a edi kan a woretu kwan akɔ ɔman a ɛrenya nkoanim mu ̶ anaa wɔ wiase ne fa foforo biara no ̶ emmu ehu a ɛka obi bere a ɔkɔ amammerɛ foforo mu no abomfiaa.

translation.en: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly.
translation.sw: Akwantufo a wogyina pintinn na wɔn ho yɛ den mpo ama akwantu wɔ wiase a ɛrenya nkoanim yi mu anya so tumi, bere a amammerɛ mu nsakrae kakraa bi na ehia.

translation.en: Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize.
translation.sw: Ne titiriw no wɔ wo nna edi kan mu no, susuw ho sɛ wobɛsɛe sika wɔ aburokyire ahosiesie ne ahɔhogyebea ahorow a ɛyɛ papa, aduane, ne nneɛma a ɛbɛboa ma ɛhɔ ne wo agye.

translation.en: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.
translation.sw: Nna matrase so anaa kɛtɛ so wɔ fam wɔ mmeae a wonnim mmoa a ɛwɔ hɔ.

translation.en: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
translation.sw: Sɛ wo soeɛ wɔ abɔten a, fa mpa a wɔda so wɔ abɔnten anaasɛ mpa a wɔde sɛn dua ho sɛnea ɛbɛbɔ ho ho ban afi awɔ, nyanyankyerɛ ne nea ɛtete saa ho.

translation.en: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night.
translation.sw: Fa kɔfe a ɛyɛ papa hyɛ wo fi ma anɔpa no ne chamomile tii a ɛdwodwo no anadwo no.

translation.en: When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special.
translation.sw: Bere a wote wo fi na wokɔ nsrahwɛ wɔ wo man mu no, wonya bere hwɛ wo ho na wotumi nya sima kakra yɛ tii soronko ma wo ho.

translation.en: If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies:
translation.sw: Sɛ wo pɛ biribi a wonyɛɛ bi da a, fa hokwan no yɛ nnuaba mu nsu anaa yam nnuaba ahorow bi.

translation.en: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine.
translation.sw: ebia wobɛba abehu anonne a ne yɛ nyɛ kyekyerɛkyɛnn a wobetumi ayɛ no anɔpa bere a woasan akɔ wo dedaw mu bio no.

translation.en: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
translation.sw: Sɛ wote ɔman a nsa a wɔnom no gu ahorow a, kɔ nsanom beae ahorow wɔ wo mpɔtam hɔ a wontaa nkɔ hɔ no.

translation.en: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.
translation.sw: Wɔn a wonnim nsɛmfua a wɔde di dwuma wɔ ayarehwɛ adwuma no mu no, asɛmfua nsaneyare no gu mu ahorow.

translation.en: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites.
translation.sw: Mmoawmmoawa bi a wɔfrɛ wɔn pathogen, te sɛ virus, bacterium, apotobibire anaa aboawa a odidi mmoawa foforo ho tumi ma yare sane.

translation.en: A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person.
translation.sw: Yɛwɔ nsaneyare nso a wonya bere a wokɔ mpɔtam a obi a woanya yare no bi wɔ no.

translation.en: Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases.
translation.sw: Aban pii hwehwɛ sɛ nsrahwɛfo a wɔreba hɔ, anaa wɔn man mufo a wɔrefi hɔ ɔman no mu no wɔ nnuru a ɛbɔ ban fi nyarewa ahorow bi ho no.

translation.en: These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
translation.sw: Saa ahwehwɛde yi begyina ɔman ko a ɔkwantufo no akɔsra anaa ɔpɛ sɛ ɔkɔ hɔ so.

translation.en: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families.
translation.sw: Asɛntitiriw biako a “Charlotte”, “North Carolina”, da no adi ne sɛ, edi mu yiye wɔ ɔkwan pii so ma abusuafo.

translation.en: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
translation.sw: Nnipa a wɔtete mmeae ahorow no kyerɛ mu a, nea nti a wɔkɔ hɔ no gyina abusua ayɔnkofa so, ɛnna kurow no mu nso na wonya kwan ne mmofra bom gye wɔn ani.

translation.en: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
translation.sw: Mfe 20 ni no, mmofra ayɔnkofa a akɔ so wɔ “Uptown Charlotte” no anyin akɔ anim yiye.

translation.en: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
translation.sw: Amansan lɔre nyɛ ade a abusuafo a wɔwɔ Charlotte no taa de di dwuma, mmom ɛho tumi ba mfaso wɔ bere bi mu.

translation.en: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
translation.sw: Sɛ lɔre no bɛfa apasengyafo a wɔboro 2 no ma bow no kɔ soro, ɛno nti ɛma amansan afiri fa no bow yɛ den sene sɛnea wɔrehwehwɛ no.

translation.en: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
translation.sw: Antarctica ne baabi a ɛhɔ yɛ nnwunu pa ara wɔ asase so, na atwa Anafo fam poolu no ho ahyia.

translation.en: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
translation.sw: Ɛhɔ nsrahwɛ kɔ boɔ yɛ den, ɛhia ahoɔden, na wɔbɛtumi akɔ hɔ wɔ ahohuru bere no mu ɛfiri Obubuo-Ogyefuo, na deɛ ɛtaa yɛ Peninsula, Asaasetam ne Ross Po.

translation.en: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
translation.sw: Adwumayɛfo mpepem pii tena hɔ wɔ ahohuru bere bere mu wɔ saa mmeae nnan; kakra bi nso tena wɔ awɔ bere no mu.

translation.en: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
translation.sw: Antarctica yɛ asasetamaa beae bi obiara nte hɔ a ne kɛse bɛyɛ kilomita 2-3 na asukɔtwea agye hɔ afa.

translation.en: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
translation.sw: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a mframa bɔ kɔ asase no so, foro bepɔw anaasɛ ɛbɛduru poolu ade no yɛ kɛse no ho.

translation.en: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
translation.sw: Kilomita no 1600 na ɛda “South Pole Traverse” (anaa “Highway”) no ne “McMurddo Station” no ntam a ɛkɔka “Pole” no wɔ “Ross Sea” no so.

translation.en: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
translation.sw: Ɛyɛ asukɔtwea a wɔahyehyɛ no akuwakuw a wɔde frankaa ahyehyɛ no nso. Gye sɛ lɔre akɛse yi bi a wɔahyɛ da atu asi hɔ na ɛtwe lɔre nkumaa a wɔde asukɔtwea akuwakuw yi agu mu yi.

translation.en: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
translation.sw: Eyinom nkɔ ntɛm, ɛno nti ɛsɛ sɛ wofi kwan a wɔatwa ato hɔ no so kɔfa “Transantarctic Mountains” no ho de koduru asase no so.

translation.en: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
translation.sw: Nea ɛde akwanhyia ba pa ara wɔ awɔw bere mu ne kwantempɔn a ɛso yɛ toro, nantekwan (kwan nkyɛn nantekwan) a ɛso yɛ toro ne titiriw namɔn a ɛso yɛ toro.

translation.en: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
translation.sw: Anyɛ koraa no, ɛsɛ sɛ wunya mpaboa a nkotoo wɔ ase bi hyɛ. Ahuhuru bere mu mpaboa ase yɛ toro wɔ nsukyenee ne asukɔtwea mu, a mpo awɔw bere mu mpaboa binom nni dwuma yiye.

translation.en: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
translation.sw: Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaboa no mu dɔ bɛyɛ milimita no 5 (1/5 inch) anaa nea ɛboro saa, na akade a wɔde ayɛ no nso yɛ mmerɛw a ebetumi asɔw awɔw ano.

translation.en: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
translation.sw: Mpaboa no bi wɔ ahobammɔ akade bi a epue wɔ ho na ɛwɔ ahobammɔ akade yi bi a wɔde di beae a ɛyɛ toro so, na eye pa ara ma mpaboa binom, na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde bɛyɛ mpaboa no ase anaa wɔde bɛto mpaboa no ase.

translation.en: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
translation.sw: Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaboa a wogyina so no wɔ fam na ɛyɛ nea ɛtrɛw. Wɔde anwea, abow anaa nkyene (“calcium chloride”) gu kwantempɔn anaa ɔkwan no so na ama nantew ayɛ mmerɛw.

translation.en: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
translation.sw: Asukɔtwea anaa nsukyenee a esian no nyɛ ade a ɛyɛ hu; mmeae a eisan no tumi som kakra, na afei nea ɛboro so no asian abegu fam.

translation.en: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
translation.sw: Ͻhaw no ne sɛ, asukɔtwea yɛ ade a ɛkye, enti ehia ɔhyɛ bi ansa na asian, ɛnna asukɔtwea a edi kan sian no nso boa ma afoforo nso sian.

translation.en: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
translation.sw: Ɛtɔ mmere bi a, ade a ɛma asukɔtwea no kye no ne awia, ɛtɔ mmere bi nso a asukɔtwea a ɛtɔ bebree no, ɛtɔ mmere bi nso a anammɔntu a efi nipa hɔ.

translation.en: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
translation.sw: Anweatwahyia ahum yɛ ahum a etwa anwea hyia na ne mframa no anoden wɔ fam, na ɛsesa mframa a ɛwɔ hɔ no kɔ fam san nso de ba soro.

translation.en: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
translation.sw: Ɛma mframa a ano yɛ den (a mpɛn pii no ɛyɛ kwansin anaa dɔnhwerew no 100 de kosi 200 so), na bere a anweatwahyia ahum no rekɔ so nyinaa no, na ɛretase nneɛma a emu yɛ duru kɔ mframa mu.

translation.en: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
translation.sw: Wɔhyɛ ase te sɛ hwiei a ɛresian afi ahum mununkum mu, na ɛka asase a, adane anweatwahyia ahum.

translation.en: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
translation.sw: Nnipa a wɔma “VPN” (“virtual private network”) no wɔ ɔkwan soronko a wɔfa so siw amanyɔ a ɛmma nnipa kwan mma wɔnkasa ne abɛɛfo kwantempɔn mu twitwa ano.

translation.en: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
translation.sw: Wɔn na wɔwɔ tumi wɔ “web proxies” so esiane nneɛma bi nti: Sɛ abɛɛfo kwantempɔn no so yɛ ma a, wɔn na woyi fa baabi foforo, a ɛnyɛ “http” nko ara.

translation.en: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
translation.sw: Wɔn na wɔma “bandwidth” a egyina so na wɔsom ɔmanfo nso yiye. Wɔabɔ ho ban a ɛyɛ den sɛ obi behu nea ewom.

translation.en: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
translation.sw: Nsɛnkyerɛwfo taa twa atoro fa nea nti a wɔyɛ no saa, wɔ bere a wɔka se “ɛyɛ ade a wɔyɛ de bɔ korɔno”.

translation.en: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
translation.sw: Nokwasɛm ne sɛ, amantam ahyɛnsode nɔma no nni nsunsuanso biara wɔ ɔkwan bɔne a wɔfa so sua no: sɛ wɔbɛhwɛ ɔkwan a wɔfa so yɛ no asua ayɛ bi nkakrankakra no yɛ adwuma sɛnea akade no ankasa yɛ adwuma no.

translation.en: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
translation.sw: Nea nti a wɔyɛ saa no ne sɛ wɔbɛboa ama adwumakuw ahorow no kwan ama wɔn ankasa ahwɛ wɔn aguadi so; ne nyinaa yɛ sikasɛm nti na wɔyɛ saa.

translation.en: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
translation.sw: Esiane sɛ wotumi kasa wɔ abɛɛfo kwantempɔn no so nti, ɛho mpo nhia sɛ wobɛkɔ akɔkasa wɔ ahamatorofo adwumakuw bi mu a ɛwɔ baabi a wote anaa baabi a wubetu kwan akɔ.

translation.en: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
translation.sw: Nhyehyɛe pɔtee biara nso nni hɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ wugyina so kotwa nɔma wɔ kurow a wote so no mu; wubetumi apɛ abɛɛfo kwantempɔn biara a ɛwɔ “Chicken”, “Alaska”, na woagyina so ayi nɔma a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wowɔ “Arizona”.

translation.en: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
translation.sw: Mpɛn pii no, ɛsɛ sɛ wopɛ amansan nɔma wɔ nkyɛn a “PSTN” hamatorofo mpo betumi afrɛ wo. Baabi a nɔma no wɔ no ma nsakrae ba nkurɔfo frɛ a wɔbɛfrɛ wo no mu.

translation.en: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
translation.sw: “Real-Time apps” yɛ kɔmputa anaa ahamatorofo mu akade no mu bi a ɛkyerɛ nsɛm ase fi kasa bi mu kɔ kasa foforo mu.

translation.en: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
translation.sw: Saa “aplikahyens” no mu bi mpo tumi kyerɛ nkyerɛwde ahorow ase kɔ kasa foforo mu anaa wotumi kyerɛ anituade nneɛma ase kɔ kasa foforo mu wɔ bere a wode ahamatorofo no akyerɛ dekode no so.

translation.en: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
translation.sw: Mfidi a edi kasa nkyerɛase ho dwuma no akɔ n’anim yiye, ɛnna seesei nso ɛtaa ma nkyerɛase a nkekaawa biara nni ho (ɛnna ɛmma nsɛnhunu bebree), nanso ehia ahwɛyiye, efisɛ ebetumi akɔba no sɛ ankyerɛ nsɛm no ase yiye.

translation.en: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
translation.sw: Akade ahorow no mu biako a edi mu a wɔde di kasa nkyerɛase ho dwuma ne “Google Translate”, a ɛboa ma obi tumi yɛ ɔkasa nkyerɛase adwuma wɔ bere a onni intanɛt so, na watwe kasa koro a ɔreyɛ nkyerɛase no wom no ho deeta.

translation.en: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
translation.sw: Sɛ wode “GPS” akade ahorow no mu biara wɔ w’ahamatorofo so no ma dwuma a woredi no yɛ mmerɛw ɛnna ɛsan nso ma wo ahotɔso wɔ bere a wunni wo man mu.

translation.en: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
translation.sw: Ɛmma wonsɛe sika wɔ bere a woretɔ maapo ama “GPS” no, anaa woretɔ “GPS” akade anaa worefɛm bi afi adwumakuw a wɔde lɔre fɛm mu.

translation.en: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
translation.sw: Sɛ wunni deeta wɔ w’ahamatorofo no so, anaa sɛ deeta nni beae a wowɔ no a, ɛmma dwuma a woredi no nkɔ waano waano anaa etumi te kɔ koraa.

translation.en: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
translation.sw: Ahamatorofo kaade a wotua sika ansa na wɔanya kwan de adi dwuma a wobetumi nso de adi dwuma wɔ ahamatorofo a wotua sika tɔ no amonom anaa ahamatorofo biara so no abu so wɔ sotɔɔ a ɛhyehyɛ ntokuru mu.

translation.en: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.
translation.sw: Kaade binom ye sɛ wode bɛfrɛ baabiara no, ebinom nso bɔ wɔn ho mmɔden de sika toto frɛ a wɔbɛfrɛ no ho wɔ aman binom mu.

translation.en: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
translation.sw: Sɛ wubenya kwan de eyinom biara adi dwuma no gyina ahamatorofo a wode di dwuma a wuntua sika na obiara betumi afrɛ afa so no so.

translation.en: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
translation.sw: Nhyehyɛe a ɛwɔ daadaa mfonitwa ho no bi ara na ɛwɔ sinitwa nso ho, a ebi mpo wɔ soro sen saa.

translation.en: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.
translation.sw: Sɛ wɔmma ho kwan sɛ wubetwa biribi mfoni a, ɛnde to w’adwene mu wɔ sɛ wubetwa dekode no sini.

translation.en: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
translation.sw: Sɛ wode afiri a ɛfa wim twa mfoni anaa sini na ɛredi dwuma a, di kan gye akwannya wɔ nea ɛsɛ sɛ wutwa ho na hwɛ hu nea ɛma wo ho kwan saa anaa hwɛ sɛ tumi krataa bi ka ho ana.

translation.en: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
translation.sw: Sɛ wode afiri a ɛfa wim twa sini wɔ wimhyɛn gyinabea anaa wɔ amanfo ti so no nyɛ ade pa, mpo sɛ ɛyɛ ade pa wɔ wo mpɔtam a.

translation.en: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.
translation.sw: Seesei nnipa betu kwan afa wim a, wodi ho dwuma wɔ wimhyɛn adwumakuw no hɔ ankasa wɔ bere a wɔnyɛ nhwehwɛmu mfa bow no ntoto ho.

translation.en: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
translation.sw: Ɛtɔ da a, wimhyɛn koro no ara kura bow a ɛda nso wɔ ntentanfiri so, a ehia sɛ wɔbɛyɛ nhwehwɛmu afa ho, na wɔasan nso ahwɛ ntentanfiri a saa wimhyɛn adwumakuw no wɔ so ansa na wɔagye ato mu.

translation.en: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
translation.sw: Enhia sɛ wubegye akwantu krataa atu kwan akɔ aman binom so sɛ nsrahwɛni anaa sɛ oguadini de, nanso sɛ wobɛkɔ hɔ sɛ osuani a wufi ɔman foforo so no bɛma woakyɛ sen sɛ worekɔ nsrahwɛ bi kɛkɛ.

translation.en: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
translation.sw: Ne nyinaa mu no, sɛ woretu kwan akɔkyɛre wɔ ɔman foforo so de a, ehia sɛ wubegye akwantu krataa.

translation.en: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.
translation.sw: Nhyehyɛe ahorow a wɔyɛ no akwantu krataagye mu no, asuafo akwantu krataagye no da nso fi nsrahwɛfo anaa aguadifo akwantu krataagye no ho.

translation.en: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.
translation.sw: Aman pii mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ wunya akwannya krataa fi sukuu a worekosua ade wɔ hɔ no hɔ, ɛnna bio nso, ɛsɛ sɛ wunya adansedi krataa a ɛfa wo sikatua a ɛreboa wo sukuukɔ no wɔ afe a edi kan no mu ho.

translation.en: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
translation.sw: Bɔ mmɔden gye nhyehyɛe a ɛda w’akwantu no ho fi sukuu a worekosua ade wom no ne akwantubea no nkyɛn.

translation.en: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.
translation.sw: Sɛ wonyɛ ɔman ananmusini de a, sɛ woretu kwan akɔ ɔman foforo so akɔyɛ adwuma a, ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ towtua ho nkrataa wɔ ɔman a wote mu no mu.

translation.en: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.
translation.sw: Akatua ho towtua no da nso wɔ aman ahorow so, ɛnna towtua ho nhyehyɛe no nso da nso wɔ aman ahorow so.

translation.en: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
translation.sw: Aman akɛse mu te sɛ United States ne Canada mu no, wɔma soro hɔfo no ne asehɔfo no nyinaa tua akatua ho tow, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ na towtua ho nhyehyɛe no bɛda nso wɔ amantam ahorow no mu.

translation.en: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.
translation.sw: Ebetumi akɔba no sɛ nhwehwɛmu a ɛwɔ sɛ wɔyɛ wɔ akwantubea a ɛwɔ wo man mu no nni hɔ anaa ɛyɛ ade a wɔnyere akwantufo no pii de, nanso akwantubea a wɔde nneɛma fa no de, wobetumi ahaw w’adwene pa ara.

translation.en: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
translation.sw: Hwɛ sɛ wowɔ nneɛma a wopɛ sɛ wode ba anaa nea wompɛ sɛ wode ba no ho nimdeɛ, na fa nea ɛboro nea ɛsɛ sɛ wofa no so no kyerɛ.

translation.en: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website.
translation.sw: Ͻkwan a ɛsɛ sɛ wofa so na wommerɛw wɔ adwuma a ɛfa kwan a wotu kyerɛwkyerɛw mu no ne sɛ wobɛpɛ nimdeɛ soronko afi ntentanfiri a akwantu ho nsɛm kɔ so wɔ hɔ.

translation.en: After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
translation.sw: Sɛ wunya nimdeɛ fa ɔkwan a wɔfa so di dwuma ahorow wɔ ntentanfiri no so wie a, w’ankasa betumi abue wo ntentanfiri.

translation.en: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.
translation.sw: Sɛ wubetu wo ho akyɛ akɔ mmoa wɔ bere a woretu kwan no ye de, nanso ɛnyɛ mmoa no nko ara na ehia.

translation.en: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.
translation.sw: Sɛ wobɛtena ɔman foforo so asan aboa ɔman no yɛ ɔkwan soronko a wubetumi afa so ahu amammere foforo, ahyia nnipa afoforo, anya nhunumu soronko asan anya nimdeɛ wɔ nneɛma binom yɛ ho.

translation.en: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
translation.sw: Ɛsan nso yɛ ɔkwan pa a wubetumi afa so ayɛ wo sika ho ntotoe ama woatena hɔ akyɛ, efisɛ atuhoakyɛ nnwuma pii no ara ma wo ɔdan ne akatua kakra.

translation.en: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.
translation.sw: Vikings nam Russia nsu so na wokoduruu “Black Sea” ne “Caspian Sea” no so.

translation.en: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
translation.sw: “White Sea-Baltic Canal” nam “Lake Onega”, “Lake Ladoga” ne “Saint Petersburg” nsu ne ɔtare so na ɛka “Arctic Ocean” ne “Baltic Sea” bom.

translation.en: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
translation.sw: “Lake Onega” nso ne “Volga” ka bom, enti sɛ ebefi “Caspian Sea” wɔ bere a ɔnam “Russia” no nso tumi yɛ ye.

translation.en: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.
translation.sw: Hu no sɛ wunya duru nsu no ano a suhyɛn nketewa no sisi no a, wubehu biribiara mu fann. Wubehyia nnipa a wɔn nso foro suhyɛn nketewa no bi ama wɔaka wɔn nsɛm akyerɛ wo.

translation.en: Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc.
translation.sw: Nneɛma a wobɛhyɛ no nso bi ne nnipa a wohia mmoa, nnipa a wɔrepopa wɔn suhyɛn nketewa no ho, hyɛntwifo a wɔwɔ nsanombea, ne nea ɛkeka ho.

translation.en: Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
translation.sw: Bɔ mmɔden sɛ wo ne nnipa dodow biara a wopɛ bɛkasa. Akyiri no, obiara behu wo ama wɔati ho akyerɛ wo suhyɛn koro a ɛrepɛ nnipa afa.

translation.en: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully.
translation.sw: Wo woredan kuw bi ayi wimhyɛn a wopɛ sɛ wode tu kwan no a, yɛ ahwɛyie.

translation.en: Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
translation.sw: Ewom sɛ wobɛpɛ sɛ wode wimhyɛn koro no ara betu kwan de, nanso ɛsɛ sɛ wuhu sɛ akwannya a wunya wɔ hɔ no betumi asesa ama wimhyɛn foforo ho nhyehyɛe no mmom bɛyɛ ama wo.

translation.en: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines.
translation.sw: Wimhyɛn kuw bi te sɛ “Emirates”, “Etihad Airways”, “Qatar Airways” ne “Turkish Airlines” ahyɛ wɔn nhyehyɛe ahorow a wogyina so som amanfo no mu kena wɔ Abibiman mu, ɛnna nea ɛkokɔ Abibiman nkurow binom nso so no, wɔayɛ bow no yiye asen Amannɔne wimhyɛn kuw no bi.

translation.en: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014.
translation.sw: Afe 2014 mu no, na “Turkish Airlines” no yɛ adwuma kɔ mmeae 39 wɔ Abibiman nkurow 30 so.

translation.en: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare.
translation.sw: Sɛ wowɔ mmere wɔ hɔ a wode betu kwan a, fa akwantu sika a wubetua de akɔ Abibiman mu no toto kwan a wubetu akɔ wiase afanan ahorow no ho.

translation.en: Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
translation.sw: Mmeae a enni Abibiman mu no, sɛ wubetu kwan akɔ hɔ a, bɔ mmɔden pɛ sika a wode betua akwantu krataa biara a ɛka nea wowɔ dedaw no ho, mmaeɛ ho tow, lɔrefa sikatua, ne nea ɛkeka ho.

translation.en: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes.
translation.sw: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wutu kwan fa wiase afanan nyinaa wɔ “Southern Hemisphere” a, wimhyɛn ne beae a wubesi no ho yɛ den kakra esiane ɔkwan a wunnya wɔ popɔn so no nti.

translation.en: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings).
translation.sw: Nnwumakuw a wodi wimhyɛnfa ho dwuma no mu biara nni tumi wɔ popɔn so fa no nyinaa so wɔ “Southern Hemisphere” (ɛnna “Sky Team” nso nni tumi wɔ popɔn so fa yi mu biara so).

translation.en: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.
translation.sw: Mmom, wuyi popɔn so fa a efi “South Pacific” a ɛwɔ “Santiago de Chile” de kosi “Tahiti” a ɛyɛ “LATAM Oneworld” wimhyɛn no to nkyɛn a, “Star Alliance” wɔ tumi wɔ nkae no nyinaa so.

translation.en: This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
translation.sw: Sɛ wompɛ sɛ wofa “South Pacific” ne “South America” atɔe fam no a, ɛnyɛ saa wimhyɛn yi nkutoo na ɛsɛ sɛ wofa.

translation.en: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris.
translation.sw: Afe 1994 mu no, “Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh” a ɛyɛ mantam biako wɔ “Azerbaijan” no koo nnipa a wɔwɔ “Azeris”.

translation.en: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it.
translation.sw: “Armerian” taa akyi maa wɔtee ɔman foforo. Mmom, saa ɔman yi nyɛ ɔman a wogye to mu, mpo “Armenia” man no nnye nto mu.

translation.en: Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
translation.sw: Amanaman nkitahodi ho akyinnyegye wɔ saa ɔman yi ho no gu so ara resɛe twaka a ɛda “Armenia” ne “ Azerbaijan” ntam no.

translation.en: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.
translation.sw: “Canal District” (Dutch: Grachtengordel) yɛ mansin a etwa “Binnenstad” a ɛwɔ “Amsterdam” ho hyia a egyee din pa ara wɔ mfe ɔha a ɛto so 17 no mu.

translation.en: The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
translation.sw: Esiane sɛ saa mansin yi wɔ amammere ne abakɔsɛm a edi mu ne ntetee pa a ɛda nso wɔ ɔman no mu no nti, wɔayi saa mansin yi sɛ “UNESCO World Heritage Site”.

translation.en: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
translation.sw: Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza ne Monterosso yɛ Italy a ɛwɔ Liguria mpoano nkurow nketewa anum a ɛwɔ Cinque Terre a ɛkyerɛ Nsase Anum.

translation.en: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
translation.sw: Saa nkurow nketewa yi wɔ “UNESCO World Heritage List” no so.

translation.en: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
translation.sw: Mfe ɔha pii a atwam kɔ no, nnipa ahwɛ asisi bamma ahorow wɔ asase a ɛkɔ abo a ɛwɔ po no soro no so.

translation.en: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
translation.sw: Mpuntu a egyina nkabom so a enni no ne n’ahoɔden no fa bi. Akwan, keteke ne korow na ɛka nkurow nketewa yi bom, ɛnna ɛhyɛn ntumi mfiri abɔnten so nwura mu.

translation.en: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
translation.sw: Ewom sɛ French kasa no fa bi a Belgium ne Switzerland ka no da nso kakra fi French kasa a wɔka no wɔ France no de, nanso ɛbɛn yiye a wɔka a wɔte wɔn ho ase.

translation.en: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.
translation.sw: Titiriw, nsonsonoe kakra da French nɔma ne nsɛmfua a Belgium ne Switzerland de di dwuma ne nea French kasa a wɔka no wɔ France no ntam.

translation.en: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
translation.sw: Eyi nte nkɔda no, sɛ nnipa a wofi Belgium ne Switzerland no akɔ sukuu akosua French kasa no ankasa a, wobetumi ate French kasa no ankasa nɔma ahorow a wodi di dwuma no ase a wɔmmerɛw ho.

translation.en: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
translation.sw: Mmeae binom wɔ wiase yi mu no, sɛ obi behim ne nsa akyerɛ wo no kyerɛ “nkyia”.

translation.en: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.
translation.sw: Mmom, Malaysia man mu no, nnipa a wɔte Malaysia nkurow nketewa binom so no him wɔn nsa kyerɛ wo anaa wɔbu wɔn akyerɛkyerɛkwan nsatea no kyerɛ ɔhonam no so a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ “wɔrefrɛ wo”, a saa ara bi na aman a wɔwɔ Atɔe fam no nso de di dwuma.

translation.en: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
translation.sw: Saa kwan koro no ara so no, ɔkwantuni a ofi Britain wɔ Spain no nso de ne nsa a ɔrehim (a anka ɛsɛ sɛ ɔde kyerɛ nea ɔrehim ne nsa kyerɛ no ankasa so no) kyerɛ onii no sɛ ɔsan n’akyi mmra.

translation.en: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
translation.sw: Kasahorow a yehu no sɛ yɛde boa kasa binom no yɛ kasa a nnipa a wɔwɔ ɔhaw wɔ wɔn ankasa kasa a wɔde di nkitaho ho no de di dwuma.

translation.en: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
translation.sw: Eyinom da nso fi kasahorow a ɛyɛ kasa a nnipa a wɔnka kasa biako tumi de di nkitaho no ho.

translation.en: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
translation.sw: Sɛ ɔhyew wom ɛda no mu a, akwantufo a wɔkɔ hɔ no hu kumaforote a ɛyɛ wɔn te sɛ nsu (anaa nneɛma foforo bi).

translation.en: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
translation.sw: Saa nneɛma yi betumi ayɛ ɔhaw ama ɔkwantuni bi a obehu no sɛ kumaforote, efisɛ obetumi asɛe n’ahoɔden ne nsu a aka no wɔ ho.

translation.en: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
translation.sw: Anweatan a emu yɛ hyew no mpo tumi yɛ nwunu anadwo bere mu. Ɔhyew hwere tumi yɛ ɔhaw ma onipa a ɔnhyɛ atade a ɔhyew wom.

translation.en: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
translation.sw: Ɔhyew bere mu no, sɛ wonenam pɔw mu a, ɛsɛ sɛ wode to wo tim sɛ wubehyia ntontom.

translation.en: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
translation.sw: Mpo sɛ wonam nhimahobea pɔw mu a, anitɛtɛ bere kumaa bi a wubebue wo hyɛn awura mu no tumi ma ntontom ho kwan ma wowura hyɛn no mu.

translation.en: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
translation.sw: Nnomaa ɔpakum yare anaa ɔpakum a ɛkye ntakramoa binom a wɔte sɛ nnomaa no tumi kye nnomaa ne mmoadoma.

translation.en: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
translation.sw: Saa yare a yi akye nnipa binom a wonnuru apem, nanso ebinom nam so wuwui.

translation.en: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
translation.sw: Nnipa no mu fa kɛse no ara yɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ ntakramoa ho adwuma, nanso saa yare yi betumi akye nnipa a wɔkɔhwɛ ntakramoa no nso.

translation.en: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
translation.sw: Nea edi akoten wɔ Norway ne akwan a esian a ɛdeda abotan ne obon a ɛma asase yantam ho kwan.

translation.en: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
translation.sw: Saa nsase yantam ahorow yi no, wɔfrɛ no “vidde” a nea ɛkyerɛ ne sɛ ɛyɛ asase a ɛyɛ tɛtrɛɛ, nnua nni so ɛnna biribiara nso ntwaa ho nhyiae.

translation.en: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
translation.sw: Rogaland ne Agder man mu no, wɔfrɛ no “hei” a ɛkyerɛ sɛ ɛyɛ asase a nnua nni so a mpɛn pii no nhwiren na efu wɔ so.

translation.en: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
translation.sw: Nsukyenee nhyɛ da nnyinam da biara, nanso etwiw fa bepɔw no so. Eyi tumi ma pae bepɔw no mu ɛnna etumi nso bɔ mu tokuru, a asukɔtwea twene betumi ahata so.

translation.en: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
translation.sw: Nsukyenee abodan no ho ban ne osuhyɛ no betumi abubu ama baabi a apaapae no so ahata.

translation.en: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
translation.sw: Nsukyenee ano no, show tumi bubu totɔ fam ma efi nsukyenee no ano kɔtɔ akyirikyiri.

translation.en: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
translation.sw: Eduru India ɔhyew bere no a, nsrahwɛ wɔ mmeae ahorow a ɛwɔ bepɔw so no kɔ anim pa ara yiye.

translation.en: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
translation.sw: Mmom, saa mmeae a ɛwɔ bepɔw so yi ahoɔfɛ ne nnipa a wɔkye wɔn no da nso wɔ awɔw bere mu, wɔ bere a asukɔtwea a ano yɛ den reba mmeae no bi na ama nnipa binom kwan ama wɔakɔtwi asukɔtwea hyɛn wɔ so.

translation.en: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
translation.sw: Wimhyɛn nnwumakuw kakraa bi na wogu so ma owu ho sikatua ho kwan a ɛyɛ ntewso ma sika a ɛsɛ sɛ wutua no ɔkwan a wubetu akɔyɛ ayi a etwa to no.

translation.en: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
translation.sw: Wimhyɛn nnwumakuw a wɔyɛ saa nhyehyɛe yi ne Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa a efi U.S anaa Canada, ne WestJet.

translation.en: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
translation.sw: Ͻkwan biara so no, ɛsɛ sɛ wo ne wimhyɛn adwumakuw no ankasa di saa nhyehyɛe yi ho nkɔmmɔ wɔ ahamatorofo so.
